Type.Name: DesigntimeLicenseContextSerializer

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesigntimeLicenseContextSerializer extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: This class provides a serialization method that can serialize a specified design-time license context.

block.para: Using an instance of this object with untrusted data is a security risk. Use this class only with trusted data. For more information, see Untrusted Data Security Risks.

summary.para: Provides support for design-time license context serialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Serialize (System.IO.Stream o, string cryptoKey, System.ComponentModel.Design.DesigntimeLicenseContext context);
.method public static hidebysig void Serialize(class System.IO.Stream o, string cryptoKey, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesigntimeLicenseContext context) cil managed

summary.para: Serializes the licenses within the specified design-time license context using the specified key and output stream.

Docs.param: The key to use for encryption.
